about_the_game:
Magical Girl Dash 2 - Triple Prisma Attack!


Magical Girl Dash 2 - Triple Prisma Attack! is the sequel of Magical Girl Dash, a retro arcade runner game set right after the first game. Sophie successfuly defeated the leader of the alien cats terrorizing the city and brought peace to our everyday lives. But then, one day, the villain returned more powerful and with strong allies helping her! On the brink of defeat, two other magicl girls, Elise and Emily, appeared to lend a hand to Sophie. Now, in the name of friendship, justice and love, it's time to save the city once more!

Features


  • Three different Playstyles - Choose between three magical girls, with each of them with their own playstyle!.

  • Cute Magical Girl Game - Style inspired on the classic genre of Magical Girl. Do you have a never ending passion of Sailor Moon, Precure, Card Captors Sakura and other magical girl related media? If yes you will definitely enjoy Magical Girl Dash!

  • Increase the Public Safety - Fight against evil on different parts of the city. The more you fight, the more the public safety is increased. Can the magical girls make the streets safer than ever?

  • Save the Shopping District - Not only cats, now strange rabbits and sheeps appeared to wreak havoc! Thanks to that the shopping district lost even more items. Can you recover all that was lost?

  • Retro Art - Charming and beautiful 16-bit pixel art style.

  • Online and Local Highscore - Defeat enemies, collect Miracle Fragments and find lost items from the Shopping District to increase your score. Try to beat your personal score and aim for the global highscore.

But then, one day, the villain returned more powerful and with strong allies helping her! On the brink of defeat, two other magicl girls, Elise and Emily, appeared to lend a hand to Sophie. Now, in the name of friendship, justice and love, it's time to save the city once more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32/64bit
  • Processor: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32/64bit
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound.
  • Additional Notes: To access leaderboards and online content an Internet connection is required.

short_description: Magical Girl Dash 2 - Triple Prisma Attack! is the second game of the Magical Girl Dash Series. Protect the streets of the city and fight against evil creatures causing chaos. Choose between three different magical girls, each with their own playstyle, and increase the Public Safety of the city.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
